name: Jerin
wishText: No matter how many years go by, you're still the one I want to annoy for the rest of my life. You're my favorite place to be. Happy Valentine’s Day to my amazing husband! ❤️
Thanks for being the person who : 1.loves me unconditionally 2.Decides what we’re having for dinner 3.plan all our trips 4.Still knows how to make me laugh after all this time.
